name: Modern Warfare 3 Dedicated Server Playlist
summary: Server playlist created and used by Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 (CODMW3), a political war first-person shooter game; contains plain text that describes the match rules, including map rotation settings and recipes, of a CODMW3 dedicated server.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
